game.name: Ninja Kid vs Zombies
game.description:
Are you a ninja character lover? Do you generally search for the adventure games for kids where ninja plays a main character? Is it your hobby to practice the cute ninja moves in your free time? Luckily, you have reached today to a platform where you can meet with the most popular and favorite characters like Ninja Girl and Samurai. This brave ninja kid needs your guidance to complete his most awaited adventure. Join Ninja Kid vs Zombies and help him to clean his path from the deadly zombies and reach his destination!
Do not bother girls! She is equipped with his favorite sword weapon. All you need to do is just guide him when to use it to destroy all the blood-thirsty souls and reach the final point to complete each level. Choose Samurai, Ninja Kid or Ninja Girl in this cool html5 platform game! Make your character walk and jump as per the requirement of the situation.  You can also use the Ninja Magic and throw Ninja stars using Y key. Be careful and try to avoid the injuries of the zombies. Grab as many coins and gold as you can to update your weapons and characters!
This cool action shooter zombie game includes richer and vibrant graphics combined with the highly boosted performance and seamless gameplay.  There are many cute and powerful Samurai and Ninja Girl characters to unlock. Many exciting rewards and achievements are waiting for you.  It will be amazing to pass your vacant hours with your favorite characters in this phenomenal game. Play wisely to complete all unique and challenging 36 levels! Walk, run, slash, and cut the living dead demons using your weapon! Good luck to become the best ninja player on atmegame.com without download!
